docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: If you are over 65, black, pregnant, or of Hispanic or native American descent, there is a greater-than-average chance that your blood pressure is dangerously elevated and you do not know it. Or, if you know it, there is a greater-than-average chance that it is not being properly treated, recent studies have shown.
